snippet: Clijsters, who retired in 2007 but returned, said that a second comeback is unlikely. Clijsters and her teammate in mixed doubles, Bob Bryan, were defeated in the second round of the U.S. Open.
abstract: Kim Clijsters and mixed doubles teammate Bob Bryan are defeated in the second round at the United States Open; Clijsters, who has said she will retire after this tournament, retired in 2007 but then came back; she says a second comeback is unlikely.
lead_paragraph: Clijsters, who retired in 2007 but returned, said that a second comeback is unlikely. Clijsters and her teammate in mixed doubles, Bob Bryan, were defeated in the second round of the U.S. Open.

headline.seo: Kim Clijsters, Whose First Retirement Did Not Take, Says Her Latest One Will
headline.main: Clijsters, Whose First Retirement Didn’t Take, Says Her Latest One Will
headline.print_headline: Clijsters, Whose First Retirement Didn’t Take, Says Her Latest One Will
